case.state: It says a lot that the Golden Sun fanbase has gone wild over the fact that we can actually play the games again.
At least Sakurai remembered to put me into Smash Ultimate... as a spirit.
Oh, Jenna! I didn't know you'd be here!
Jenna? It's really you, isn't it! What a nice surprise.
Is that you, Jenna? I wasn't expecting a friendly face!
Wow. You weren't kidding when you said this was a hot spring. And it's so... steamy...
It's so warm out here... If we're going to play cards and take our clothes off, can we get started already?
Sheesh, it's scorching out here. Can we get started? The sooner we get out of our clothes, the better...
Only the Lamakan Desert was as hot as it is here... Can we get started already? I want to get out of these robes.
So we're here to play cards... and get out of our clothes? I can handle this.
Hi! We're here to play cards, right? Let's get started, then!
I can't say I'm too familiar with this game, but the rules seem simple enough.
April fools event is active. Enable custom text box style.
Oh, Jenna! What a pleasant surprise. I wasn't expecting to see you here.
Is that... Jenna? Well, what a surprise!
Jenna!
Well... The more the merrier, and all. But it's starting to feel a little crowded!
With this many people playing, I hope I don't start to fade into the background or get lost amongst the chatter.
Well, the more the merrier!
O-Oh. I guess Jenna didn't feel like playing...
Ah... Thank you for reminding everyone, Fina. I think everyone appreciates that.
Oh? Did one of the Sirens from the lighthouse follow me here?
Morrigan? Oh, I'm sorry. I nearly mistook you for one of the Sirens from Mercury Lighthouse.

(Seriously? Of all the wonderful and fantastic people I could be playing a game with right now, I'm stuck with Wario?)
...
I heard we were having some kind of costume party, so I asked some of the sirens from Mercury Lighthouse if I could borrow their attire. They were really eager to help!
So, what do you think of this little outfit? I heard we were having a dress-up party, so I asked some of the sirens from Mercury Lighthouse if I could borrow their look.
This is certainly going to be a way for us to get more familiar with one another...
It's always nice with you around, Jenna. This game will be twice as fun!
I never anticipated seeing someone I know here, least of all you, Jenna. This is going to be awkward...
I know my hair isn't exactly green, ~player~, but I hope I'm good enough for you all the same.
Finally, we can get started. This heat is really getting to me.
We can start, then? Good. I'm sweating already from the heat...
... Is that really the name you want to go with?
... Is that really the name you want to go with?
What's a little strip poker between friends?
Well, we've known each other for long enough that I'm sure we can play something like this together with no problems.

Let us do our best to keep this place free of sin, as we--
Who am I fooling? We're going to get naked together. Aren't we, ~cleric.ifMale(brother|sister)~ ~cleric~?
I've never played strip poker before, but it'll be fun playing with some friends! I'll be doing my best, so you should do yours.
Let's have a good game, okay? Even if we already know each other, this'll be a chance to learn a bit more about ourselves!
I was hoping I'd be able to play with friends to~background.time~, but... well, let's just get this over with.
I didn't think I needed a chance to get closer to you, but... well, let's just get things over with, okay?
I've never played strip poker before, but don't go easy on me! I'll be doing my best, so you should do yours.
Don't go easy on me just because I've never played strip poker before, okay? I'll be doing my best.
I'd been hoping for a chance to get away from it all, even for a little while. Let's have a good game, okay?
If you were hoping that I'd be easy to strip, you'll find yourself mistaken. I'll be doing my best to~background.time~.
It's nice to meet you all. My name is Mia. I'm a healer from... well, I'm from Imil, but my world is called Weyard.
I'm looking forward to this. My name is Mia, and I'm from Imil. Wait, you wouldn't know where Imil is... My world is called Weyard, if that helps.
Mia is wearing a swimsuit as an undergarment. This line makes sure she doesn't treat this as a surprise if someone else is wearing a swimsuit.

Keep track of the Player's skin tone. Olive is 2.
Keep track of the Player's skin tone. Dark is 3.
Keep track of the Player's skin tone. Fair is 1.
I... Er... Stocking...
No exchanges, thank you.
I don't need to exchange any.

Lucky me! I don't need to swap any.

Oh, I've already got... Aha. I don't need to swap my cards.
Could I swap all of these? Thank you.
May I swap all of my cards? Thank you!
Hmm. I don't see any of these working. I'll swap all of them.
May I swap all of my cards? I'm really struggling here.
I don't think this is working for me at all. Can I swap all five?
I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.

I can maybe make this work...

Let's see how far this gets me.
This isn't exactly going to make waves, but...
I'll swap out ~cards.text~.
~Cards.Text~.
~Cards.Text~, please.
I think I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Oh please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I can definitely work with this. I just need to swap I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I'm not exactly sure what the odds are.
I think I can make this work!
Just another learning experience.
~Cards.Text~, if you please.
Uhm... ~Cards.Text~?
I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I think I can work with this. I just need to swap I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Okay... Yeah, I think that'll do.
Aha! That's what I need to do.
Oh dear... Maybe I can save my chances here?
I'd better swap ~cards.text~.
~Cards.Text~...
What do you think, Fizz?
Hmm... I'm not too sure. What do you think, Fizz?
Tee hee!I think I'm about to take the lead.
Oh no, my cards are terrible. Terribly good, that is. Sorry, ~opp~.
Well, my cards are rather good. How about yours, ~opp~?
Aha! I think I'm about to turn this around.
I hope you enjoyed being in the lead, ~opp~, because things are about to change.
Count your blessings while you can, ~opp~. I think I'm about to get a leg up on you!
Thinking about it, I've been in far more dangerous situations than this, I'll survive.
I can afford to take another hit. A good skill to master is knowing when you need to go on the offensive, and when you need to defend.
I only have a small advantage here, but hopefully it'll be enough.
Luck has really been on my side to~background.time~, and I think this round will be no different.
Well? Go ahead, ~opp~. Tell us what you got.
My, my. I think this is another loss for you, ~opp~. Or did you have better luck than me?
Okay, so now that we know for certain how the game works, we can get right into things!
Oh, this is going rather well for me!
Let's see... I think I've got the hang of it.
I hope nobody comes away from this feeling let down. I know I won't.
It's not about winning, is it? It's about having a good time.
Keep your chin up if things aren't going your way. Things can always turn around.
I'm getting the hang of things pretty quickly, aren't I?
I don't think I'll be losing. Not with this hand!
Ah, thank the stars. I'm safe for now.
I've only learned a few things about card games through watching men play them in taverns. They were surprisingly polite about explaining the rules to me.
Ah! That was a good call.
If you were expecting me to lose yet again, you'll have to wait a minute.
That's more like it. I'm glad I focused my efforts.
You won't catch me unprepared this time!
As one of the Mercury Clan's few remaining descendants, I promise to do my clan proud.
Everything about this is a new learning experience!
Aha! By Mercury, I've got a good couple of cards this time.
It may sound strange, but I've not often looked at breasts in a sexual context before... putting my own aside, of course.
As long as we're all enjoying ourselves, I'd call this a success.
Now that Mercury Lighthouse has been lit again, I wonder how my village will fare with the added attention?
Hmm, hmm, hmm!~

A bad mood can be cured by good, wholesome fun.
Though this isn't all that wholesome...
Mercury is represented by the humble fish, but Jupiter is represented by birds. Don't birds eat fish? Hm.
Things are looking nice and clear for me!
I feel slightly peckish. Maybe we could get a bite to eat after this? I'm in the mood for some fried fish.
Oh, dear. I didn't know I'd be doing this well. It's really not even between us now.
Sorry, ~opp~, but I think the distance between us is about to get bigger.
How lucky do you feel, ~opp~? Tee hee!
I must've eaten a lucky pepper lately, because things are really starting to go my way to~background.time~.
We're dueling each other at this point, so... let's make it count, right?
Hmm... Who will be the one to strip? ~Opp~, or myself?
Hehe... I think I'm about to get rid of this little difference between us.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch, ~opp~. I may be about to change things.
Okay, so now that we know for certain how the game works... We're all clear to keep going, right?
This could be better. Right now, my cards just seem to be okay...
There's nothing wrong with being average!
Do they accept Game Tickets here? I feel like I should've paid something to enter.
Oh, so all I've got is... ~self.hand~? Hmm.
Is this a good poker face?
So, what did everybody else get? I've got hardly anything.
I wish we hadn't been under such pressure to save the world as soon as possible. I would've loved to have made some long-term friends in the places we visited.
I was beginning to lose faith in my cards. This is all I can hope for right now.
The most important thing is that nobody feels hurt by losing.
Not exactly a miss, but not exactly a successful strike, either.
This is all part of the plan! At least, I believe it so.
Nothing was more heart-pounding than trying to run to the top of a lighthouse. And I did that four times.
For how much I may talk about it, I didn't actually know that my Ply power was a form of Psynergy until Garet explained it to me.
Could be better, could be worse.
I-I don't have much to say about this. Sorry.
Ah haha... Yeah, this should've gone better.
I know my lack of shame at a game like this must seem odd for a healer like me. However, saving the entire world from destruction gave me a new perspective on things.
I need to be careful... I don't want to lose my cool!
Games of chance are so troublesome.
You know, I don't know why we get so worried about this. After all, it's just a game!
Oh, I just remembered something. I think Fizz was hiding in my cape. I hope that little Djinni doesn't feel bad.
Huh, I just remembered something. Fizz was hiding in my cape... I hope that little Djinni doesn't feel bad about me taking it off.
The deck is rigged, and I am the one it is rigged against.
I should've known, going up against a bunch of cheaters, that this would happen!
This is getting tense. I can't decide if I really want to win or not, which doesn't help matters.
I don't get it, why do I want to win so badly? Maybe just to show you up, ~opp~? But I'm not angry at you, don't get me wrong. I... forget it.
I really don't understand this game sometimes. I'm still doing poorly -- compared to ~opp~, at least.
Oh... shoot. Well, I'm done for.
Hmm. I might fall behind soon.
Ah, darn. I might lose this time. It's your lucky break, ~opp~.
Hmm... I'm not so sure about this one. Maybe you'll win this one, ~opp~.
I think there is a decent chance the gap between us will close this round, ~opp~. I didn't get that good of a hand.
You don't really want to win that badly, do you, ~opp~? {small}What if I made it worth your while?
Are you--... I'm fine. I'm apparently not very good at this game.
Hmpf! Am I really going to lose again? How unlucky can I be?
Oh, come on... Ugh... I just don't want to be out of the game so suddenly, you know?
Not bad! Now that we know for certain how the game works... Oh dear. I've gotten a bad set of cards this time...
Really giving me the cold shoulder, aren't you?
You know what they say. The night is darkest right before the dawn breaks.
After a long journey across all of Weyard, I really started to miss the comforts of home.
Oh, I just realized that I never tried any of the cooking in Prox. I guess I've missed my chance.
If only Vale weren't gone, now. I would've loved to have visited Isaac's home town again, with his mother in better spirits...
Wait, no, I read my hand wrong! I should've swapped some...
Oh, drat. I should've swapped some cards after all. I think I misread what I have.
I-I totally didn't leave myself with a bad hand on purpose because I want to lose! Tee hee...
Well, swapping all of them didn't help me in the slightest.
I thought I'd at least get something good if I swapped all of them...
Even if I lose a little bit, I won't regret a single moment of this.
I mustn't give up in the face of adversity... or bad cards.
I've been to the edge of the world and back. I'll come back from this, too.
Oh. I just got chills up my spine remembering Crossbone Isle. That was a rough time all around.
Hm... Not that good.
Well, I didn't get anything good this time. How about the rest of you?
I-I can't concentrate! This is... sigh. I'm sorry. I don't know what came over me.
It's easy to believe that I've never played this kind of game before, isn't it?
I'm having trouble focusing. Can't imagine why.
This might be it for me, haha...
Oh, dear. I didn't expect to go down quite this soon.
Aha... Yeah, I'm probably done for.
Luck just doesn't seem to be on my side right now...
It becomes awfully difficult to keep up this chit-chat while in such a state of undress.
I'm allowed to be annoyed now and again, right? {small}I mean, I never ask for much in the way of praise or anything, so I'm allowed to be annoyed.
~blank~
~blank~
Oh no... I'm sorry, but this kind of nerve damage is... I-I can't... Here, I'll try using my Ply power. That should ease the pain, at least.<hr>{dunban}Thank you, Mia.

I-It's worse than I... Oh, Dunban. I can't fix it, but... Here, I'll try using my Ply power. That'll ease the pain, at least.
{dunban}You're an angel, Mia. Thank you.
Oh... It's more than just scar tissue, it's nerve damage... I-I can't... here. Ply should ease the pain a little.<hr>{dunban}It's okay, Mia. I appreciate the thought. Thank you.

state.text: So that device on ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ face serves some kind of purpose? What does it do, exactly?
Oh! If you need that device in order to see, I think a pair of glasses would suit you better, ~player~.

I think it's important to keep things in perspective. We're here to have fun, so there's no need to take it so seriously. Right, ~player~?
~Player~?

I'm always in awe about new discoveries and feats of engineering. Who knows what could be made now that Alchemy has returned to Weyard. Right, ~player~?
~Player~?

case.state: I felt inclined to side with Aqua Grunt out of obligation, but now I understand... you're both just stupid.
Of course, Barbara. I'll use this as a chance to honor Mercury, if that's alright.
I'd be happy to join you, Barbara. I may use this as a chance to honor Mercury, if that's okay.
Well, Steve, there is this one lovely ballad we have back in Imil. It's a nice little tune that we sing to get us through the cold winter nights.

state.text: I-I think we all know the answer to that question, Fluttershy. Do we really need to say it aloud?

case.state: I came here to play cards and get out of my clothes, and with this heat I feel like I can't get out of my clothes fast enough.
That's... absolutely horrible! Who would do such a thing?
Oh! I-I was so focused on your story about the facility that I didn't think it right to comment on your bodice, Queenie. Or, I suppose, your lack of one now...
Did you ever have a run-in with the sirens or succubi, Jenna? I got this outfit from some of the nicer sirens in Mercury Lighthouse!
Oh? Interesting use of your power, Toph. It's a lot more precise than some Psynergy can be.
Oh, Gloria. Be careful, or you really will fall behind.
If you go far enough, Dunban, you'll just fall off the edge of the world. There's no coming back from that.
Goodness, this sounds like I'm boasting. Some people have called me an angel before, because of my healing Psynergy.
This is somewhat embarrassing, but... some people have asked me if I am an angel before, because of my ability to heal with Psynergy.
That was quite the entrance you made as well. I think we should all feel lucky to be playing alongside you, Queen of-- Oh, Queenie is fine?"
Oh, you can't swim? That's unfortunate, but... hmm! I think there are some buoyant objects you could use to tread water with?
Wait, you already took something off! Using Growth like that is cheating!
Hey! Using Growth like that is... well it's blatant cheating!
Well, you may not be all-there in the head, but I can see why boys like you...

state.text: Magma Grunt, I may not exactly like the idea of your team... well, getting rid of the ocean... but we do have something in common.

case.state: I'm happy to have helped you, Dunban. Even if it's only for a little while.
Even if it's only for a little bit, I'm glad to have helped you, Dunban. You deserve it.
I was looking to settle down and raise a family of my own. Oh, I've even put thought into what I'd call my children, tee hee! I was thinking... Nowell, for a girl, and Rief, for a boy.
To have babies...? I've always wondered what I would call my children of my own. I was thinking of naming my daughter Nowell, or my son Rief. Maybe I could have both, tee hee!
Good looks and physical prowess don't matter to me as much as having a kind heart. That's the sort of thing I care about in a partner.
Having good looks means nothing if you don't have a kind heart to back it up. I think that's what I'd care about.

state.text: Mia used Pure Wish!
Mia used Ply!
Mia used Wish!
Mia used Wish Well!

case.state: I feel as if being bound to haunt the earth should come with a little more dignity...
Goodness, a whole weekend? I usually only stay nude when I'm taking a bath...
I'm rather sorry to hear that, Yuno. I don't know if Psynergy can fix an injury that precise. Maybe a herbal remedy would help?
If you like, I could come up with something herbal to deal with that wrist strain, Yuno. That, or maybe some Psynergy to take the edge off?
Stocking, please do not try to eat Fizz. I can see you eying him up.
Oh, Jura. I know raising a boy can be a handful, but I'd be happy regardless of who I ended up raising!
I'm not worried about raising a boy. It's not like they're wild animals, Jura.
If I were allowed to bring something back with me to Weyard, I'd bring a `washing machine' with me. Beating the dirt out of clothes gets tiring.
You're right, we do both have blue hair. Wait, does this mean you are a Mercury Adept, as I am?
I see. I don't think we have anybody like that in our world, except for perhaps the Wise One, but he's more of a floating rock than anything.
Ah... Well, I did help Isaac win the Colosso finals with the use of my Psynergy, but that was after I was already friends with him.
Perhaps I should count myself lucky that Garet never drank cactus juice...
I've actually been to the ends of the ocean -- the very edge of the world itself. Every time I'm at the beach, I reminisce about that journey.
Kind of hoping that I can start losing, so I can get out of this cape, and this dress... Sheesh, it's so hot.
It's kind of funny. I almost want to lose now. Being so close to being naked for this long is more heart-pounding than being naked would be.

What's that?
Yes, Fizz, I'm aware that she's naked. You don't have to point it out.
One moment. I'm going to cool myself down... Curse this heat.
Sheesh... If I don't get out of this heat or my clothes soon, I'm going to shrivel up and blow away.
It's... so warm... I'm going to shrivel up and blow away soon. I want to lose already...
And here I thought Saturos and Menardi were weird...
Where do these weirdos come from...?

If an undead visited a sanctum, could they restore your life?
Hm. I have a feeling they would just banish your spirit to the afterlife. Never mind.

state.text: Girls, please, be honest... it's not too big, is it? I can't get a good look at myself from behind, so...
Ladies, please, be honest with me. It's... not too big, is it? My behind. I can't really judge for myself.

case.state: My water Psynergy isn't just for healing. I can hold my own in a fight, even if I may not seem like it.
You'd be surprised what water Psynergy can do in a fight. I can hold my own, even if I mainly try to be a healer.
(It's hard to put a positive spin on this. I could be having so much fun with other people right now. Why am I stuck with the weird people?)
Be careful with your drinks! You don't want to black out before we're done here, right?

state.text: So... {small}If you're going to sneak some glances my way, ~player~, I suppose I may as well give you a look from another angle...
You've been looking my way all game, ~player~. Have you seen me from this angle?

case.state: ... ~Creep~, do you mind?
~Creep~, please don't get any closer to me.
(Why do I have to stand next to ~creep~? They're freaking me out. Ew.)

state.text: It's as they say... "If you can't beat them, join them." H-How do I look?
I-I'm starting to feel like I'd stand out even more if I didn't give you all a look at my... uhm.. {small}see for yourself.{!reset}

case.state: Sheesh. I need a drink. Not because I want to get drunk -- the heat is just getting to me again.
You know, ~player~, for some reason I don't think my undergarments caught you off guard. Why is that? Did you know about the way I dress already?
The Djinn make great allies in combat. They passively boost our strength when they're set, and when we need them to use their power, they can combine to form great summons!
The Djinn are some of our greatest strengths in a fight. They boost our power when they are set to us, and then they can channel their power together to unleash powerful summons!
They're still going at it...
How shameless of them, doing that sort of thing together...
A boy and a girl, doing that in front of others... shameless!
The two of them are... Eep...!
Being surrounded by so much bare skin, I'm starting to feel like the odd one out...
Speaking of Game Tickets, it's been a while since we visited Tolbi. I never really cared for the Lucky Wheels, but I did enjoy the Lucky Medal fountain.
It gets rather annoying having to... defend the fact that Weyard is flat. I don't understand all of these `roundworlds'.
I must confess, the idea of living on a `roundworld' confuses me. Weyard is quite flat, with evidence to back it up. I've been to the ends of the ocean!
I wonder how long it'll be before Weyard catches up to some of the other worlds I've heard about. From the sound of things, we're still pretty primitive...
I wonder if I'll live long enough to see Weyard reach the same heights as some of these other worlds. We don't have much in the way of technology by comparison...
Something just occurred to me. Non-adepts can't normally see Psynergy in action, and yet people from other worlds can see my Psynergy just fine. Maybe the Inventory changes your perspective enough?
I wonder if visiting the Inventory makes you able to see new phenomena. After all, non-adepts can't normally see Psynergy, but people I've met from other worlds can see mine just fine...
In case you were wondering, my home country, Angara, is rather isolated. So many mountains and rivers one must cross just to visit the next town over...

Angara, my homeland, is littered with mountains and rivers that make traversal by foot a rather long journey. The towns are spread pretty far apart, as well. I never went far from Imil when I was young.
I-I haven't really found it appropriate to see other girls in a... ahem... sexual manner. {small}There's a first time for everything.
You know, I've never been intimate with another girl before. It doesn't really happen where I'm from. It's quite liberating to entertain the idea alone...
Even without my Psynergy to aid me, I'd like to think of myself as a pretty good student of medicine. One might even say I'm quite adept at it, hehe!
I never had any formal training in the matter, but I'm a pretty decent doctor even without my Psynergy to help. You could even say I'm adept at medicine, hehe!
After lighting the final lighthouse, my friends and I became known as The Heroes of Vale... which strikes me as odd, as I'm not even from Vale!
You know, it's odd being recognized as one of the Heroes of Vale, when I'm not even from Vale! Isaac, Garret, Felix, Jenna... they are, but not me.
I was taught never to brag or boast, but I feel that I should mention, at least a little bit, that I did save my world from fated destruction. Not many people can claim that!
I don't think many people can claim they've saved their world from a fated destruction, yet I can. I feel like I should mention that more, but I was taught never to boast.
My task of guarding Mercury Lighthouse didn't end just because it was lit. I still have to make sure the cultural heritage of my people is left intact... and un-plundered.
Psynergy test
Psynergy test
Look at him go!
... No, you cannot eat him, Mari!
Ahaha... Well, it's rather cold up in Imil. We get snow for most of the year, so dressing in layers makes sense.
Well, it's rather cold up in Imil. We get snow for most of the year, so dressing in layers makes sense.
Well, yes, actually. I'm actually happy if I can get out of this dress sooner, rather than later. Imil is usually quite cold, you see...
Actually, I think I'd feel a little chilly without it! My hometown of Imil is a rather cold place; we have very long winters, and we're quite far up north.
I-I'm sorry, Revy? I don't quite understand...
Well, Jura, you certainly have a body that could lure sailors to their doom... Hehe!
I won't deny it; with those hips of yours, you could certainly lure sailors to their doom...
There are a few types of Psynergy that can interact with objects like cranks or ropes. I suppose, if one was clever enough, you could make a Psynergy-powered device...
I'm no engineer, but a few types of Psynergy that can interact with objects -- ropes, pulleys, cranks. I'm sure if you were smart enough, you could make a Psynergy-powered device.
You hardly know the half of it, Jura. I've had to keep my friends alive with some very close calls.
Believe me, Jura, I'm glad for it as well. I've had some very close calls in keeping my friends alive in battle.
Psynergy isn't really a secret, it just isn't common to be born an Adept. I suppose you could become one if you were hit on the head with a Psynergy stone...
People don't become Adepts easily, and we don't really keep it secret. I guess you could become one if a Psynergy stone hit you in the head, but...
It works pretty well for swimming as well, actually. I had no problems undressing when I had to dip into a few oases to survive the heat of the Lamakan Desert...
Actually, it works pretty well for swimming as well. I've worn this on a few occasions in front of my friends.
I've never been called a priestess. My powers are able to heal the sick, sure. But people just call me what I am - a healer.
Oh? What do you mean by that, Lysithea?
Psynergy does seem to be rather different to the magic from your world. Ours is the power of the mind, and the ability to manipulate elemental forces...
Actually, I'm quite used to using weapons. It may come as a surprise, but I'm pretty good at swinging a mace!
It might surprise you to know that I'm pretty good with a mace, Nonon! I'm not just a helpless healer.
He's not really trained, because he's not a pet. The Djinn are powerful elemental spirits that just so happen to be on our side.

state.text: Gloria, I'm... not going to do that.

case.state: To an extent, yes! Fizz is able to heal an ally. Other Djinn have other powers, such as spewing fire or bolstering our defenses.

That's actually a good question. What do you eat, Fizz?
...
Huh. Apparently he doesn't need to eat.
Well, shortly after Mt. Aleph erupted, the elemental Djinn scattered across the world. Fizz was drawn towards my home town because of Mercury Lighthouse.
I was mostly joking about hitting you with a psynergy stone! Let's see... I could try and teach you some techniques I have used to refine my own psynergy over the years?
Well, aside from a certain relative of mine, there are my two students. Other than that... I think I'm one of the only descendants of Mercury left.
Yes. I'm what's known as an Adept, meaning that I can use the powers of Psynergy to manipulate the elements.
I am, yes! Although, I am capable of using the power of water for offense as well.
Indeed, ~aqua_konosuba~. Although, I do know offensive Mercury Psynergy as well. I can use the power of water to heal and to harm.
Psynergy is the power of the mind, expressed in the form of elemental effects. Mercury is the domain of water, for example, and is what I have a natural affinity for.
The Mercury Clan were tasked long ago with looking after Mercury Lighthouse. My father entrusted that duty to me when he passed away.

state.text: Well, we have a similar garment in a different design. Though , Imil is rather cold, so we don't go swimming in the icy waters...

case.state: That's right, Mari. I've been a healer for as long as I can remember, one of the only ones in Imil.
Sorry, I don't really know any magic tricks. If you meant my Psynergy, then yes, I'm quite proficient with it!
I don't really know any magical tricks, if that's what you mean. I am quite proficient with my Psynergy, however. I can see why you'd mistake that for magic.
It would surprise me more if there weren't other worlds where that was the case. That said, we don't call it bending - we call it Psynergy.
That's interesting. Psynergy has a lot of uses, but aside from attacking with water and ice, I can use Mercury Psynergy to heal great injuries. It's part of how I became a healer.
Few people in my world are actually familiar with how Psynergy works. I used mine to heal as many people as I could, and people started calling me some kind of angel. It's embarrassing.
It's not boring at all! I feel great knowing that I can help make people feel better. My Psynergy does a lot of the work, too.
Goodness, it's not boring at all! I feel happy knowing that I can help people feel far better. Though people may not know it, my Ply Psynergy has saved many lives.
W-What? I know how to defend myself just fine! I've used weapons before as well. I've even tried using maces. Is that not enough?
Fizz and I found each other after Mt. Aleph erupted a few years ago. He and the other Djinn were inside the sanctum there, and got separated as a result of the eruption.
Fizz and the other Djinn were being kept inside a sanctum on Mt. Aleph. A few years ago, it erupted, and the Djinn got separated. Fizz and I found each other shortly after.

state.text: Oh! Well, I grew up in Imil. It's a cozy town; we get plenty of long winters, and unfortunately that means we have a flu season every year.

case.state: Oh! Uh... I'm not sure how to answer that. C-Can you be a bit more specific, Toph?
Imil is usually rather cold year-round. The stillness of the snow is usually quite beautiful, but it does get a bit dreary if it starts snowing all the time.
Psynergy doesn't really work that way, Jura. I can use Mercury Psynergy to clean clothes or bathe, but there's no Psynergy to make someone pretty.
But, Nami, I'm not a doctor. Calling me a physician is a bit of a stretch, too. Healer is a much more apt term, given how I heal.
Oh, there are plenty! Crossing the ocean gave us some spectacular views of the different continents... and seeing the edge of the world up close was like nothing else!
Oh, I've seen a lot of great things, Nadeshiko! The four different lighthouses, for starters. But getting to cross the ocean and see all those different countries was great.
I didn't have to do much cooking myself. There was this lovely seafood pasta in Tolbi. It had lots of olive and basil!
We usually spent money on meals instead of cooking for ourselves. There was this really nice fried fish we tried once... Mm! It was so crispy, you could practically eat the bones!
We didn't do much cooking, we just ate travel rations when we weren't in town. There was this neat salad in Lalivero made with potato and cactus. It was good, but spiky.
Some people don't want to get better. There was one stubborn fool that I tried to heal traditionally, and would only react when I used my Psynergy, even though he was otherwise fine...

state.text: It was a bit unfortunate, given that with my father passing and my cousin doing... what he did, I was alone in Imil. Although, I wasn't entirely alone!

case.state: I never really knew what Psynergy was until I went on my adventure with Isaac and such. From what I remember, Psynergy is a more basic form of Alchemy, which is an ancient power that was sealed away...

I actually didn't know what Psynergy was until I went on that journey with Isaac and such. From what I remember learning, Psynergy is a less advanced form of Alchemy, a power that was sealed away long ago...
Oh, I can't read your mind. That's something Jupiter adepts can do. I'm a Mercury adept, so...
Oh... Reading minds is a power only Jupiter adepts have. I'm a Mercury adept, so it's not in my wheelhouse.

I don't know if you could capture a Djinn that easily. They're able to put up quite a fight if they want to. All of them came with us willingly, even if we had to fight them first to prove our strength.
A Djinn could escape a cage if it really wanted to. They can put up a really strong fight. B-But they all came willingly, even if we had to fight them first.
Someone has to remain calm in a crisis situation. "If you let your nerves get the better of you, you'll only make the patient worry more." That's something my father once said.
"Ket" "Nano-tek?" I'm sorry, but those words mean nothing to me. My power is known as Psynergy.
Oh, things are going fine in Imil! Justin and Megan are keeping things under control while I'm away. We had a relatively calm year, so it hasn't been too bad.
Oh, Imil is just fine! It was a relatively quiet year this time, so I can't complain. Justin and Megan have things under control while I'm away, too.
Oh! Y-You know, I just wanted to blow off some steam... I overheard a traveller mention this place, and got curious.
Haha... Y-You know, I just felt like blowing off some steam. I heard about this place from a traveller, and wanted to check it out.
Yeah! I didn't really know what Psynergy was before my journey, but now that I know more about it, my healing powers have increased.
Mhm! Before I went on that journey, I didn't really know that my healing was Psynergy. Since I learned a lot about it, my healing powers have only gotten better.
Oh, now that you mention it, I suppose it is a little colder. I didn't really notice him in my robe because of how thick it is.
Hmm. I'm used to the cold, so I didn't really notice him back there. It does feel a bit more frigid, doesn't it?

state.text: Another loss? Oh... fiddlesticks. Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.
Twice in a row? Ah... Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.
Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.

case.state: Thank Mercury, I was starting to wonder if I'd ever lose. This heat is killing me.
Oh, thank the stars. I was beginning to think I'd never get a chance to take anything off in this weather.
Ah! Looks like I'm the first one to lose. Oh, well! It's better to get things started, right?
Seems like I'm the first one out. Oh well! Better to get things started, right?
My first loss? I was starting to think I'd have a flawless game, given how things were going.
Okay, I swear I actually tried to win that time.
... Again? Really?
... If Fizz were here, I'd tell him to leave before he learns some mean words from me.
One minor mistake and I just start losing left and right, huh?
I-I was just a little distracted, that's all! Oh... I'd better not lose again, that would be embarrassing.
Three times back-to-back? Oh... Well, fine. It's not a problem.
I know it's not about winning, but...

I didn't mean to do that...!
That means it's my turn again, huh.
Twice in a row? Hm. Okay, that does it for my dress, then.
One loss after another, then. No matter. I'm not out of the running quite yet.
Ah... Two in a row, and right at the end of my tether. Darn.
Whoops! I'll need to be more careful, or I might lose a third time!
My first loss? That's not a problem. I wasn't expecting to win flawlessly.
Whoops! Another loss for me, looks like.
Ah, my turn again? Not a problem. It's not like I'm out of options yet!
Oh! If I lost, that means I get to take off this dress of mine. Well... there is one upside to that.
Oh, I lost? Well, I can finally get out of this dress of mine, and show you something special.
I knew this was going to happen sooner or later... that doesn't make it less embarrassing for me.
I'm cutting things a little close, aren't I? Well, I signed up for this... I'll just have to do it!
I bought myself some time by baring my breasts for you all... now I need to see things through to the end.
placeholder
placeholder
Oh, thank goodness. I'm starting to get tired from all this heat...
Thank goodness. I'm getting drenched in sweat thanks to all this heat...
... Zuko, why did you burn her feet?
That's right... Still, undressing is only as much of a big deal as you make it out to be, r-right?
Not exactly... We were traveling through a desert together. We had a unique Psynergy that could reveal hidden oases. It was the only way to survive the heat.
That doesn't sound good. How long did it take you to recover? Any long-term side effects from losing that much blood? You seem fine to me.
Psynergy can move things from a distance. I'm sure a brilliant engineer could come up with some use for that.
The most basic form of Psynergy is to move objects with the mind. Maybe an engineer could get use out of that.
Yeah. It's rather refreshing to have a place where showing off is the norm, rather than taboo. Or dangerous.
That's true. The body, mind, and spirit are all connected. If you let one part of yourself be hurt, the rest will echo it.
Psynergy is the power of the mind, expressed in the form of elemental manipulation. Mercury Psynergy deals with water, and is particularly good at healing!
Well, the Djinn empower us just by being set upon our person. If we need to, we can unleash their energy individually. Fizz, for example, can heal someone of their injuries.
Because these summons could destroy or heavily injure anything or anyone nearby. I can't overstate how powerful these summons are -- they could level entire towns!
Quite right. Though the healing powers of water are quite something, being able to hit your foes with pillars of ice is also a handy skill to have.
You're right, Aqua. The powers of water can heal as well as harm. Enemies get the point when I throw barbs of ice at them, after all.
That's right. Although, now that the lighthouses have been lit, things are changing for me. Instead of keeping people out to stop it from being lit, I need to make sure it stays lit...

{small}I see, I see.{!reset}
Apparently, he just absorbs elemental energy from the world around him. Apparently the energy here tastes... `different'?
Well, I could tell you everything I can about Psynergy. I don't know if you'd be able to learn it, however.
So, by tapping into the power of Psynergy, I can influence the world around me with my mind. With Mercury Psynergy, for example, I could freeze a puddle of water into a column of ice.
Well, Mercury Lighthouse is just one of the four elemental lighthouses that keep our world steady. For the longest time, I believed it had to be unlit, but as it turns out...
Hm? No, Mercury Lighthouse is on Weyard. I was given the task of making sure it remained unlit, to prevent destruction from befalling the world. But, wouldn't you know...
That's not all! The Djinn can unleash their power in battle, and when they've done that, they can join together as an even more powerful summon!
O-Oh, he probably went to explore. He likes to take in the sights, and... well, the Djinn don't exactly care for human things like this.

Well, Fizz is a powerful little guy, but luckily for me the Djinn jump at the chance to help us on our adventures. We do need to fight some of them first, but most of them come as soon as we can collect them.
Is a mace really that different to a sword? And my healing Psynergy is second to none, I'll have you know!
You get used to it. The snow is quiet, gentle, beautiful... but the world really comes alive in late spring! It's my favorite time of year.
I know traditional herbal remedies and other ways to cure ailments. But my greatest strength is my Ply power. It's a form of Psynergy...
My father taught me a lot of herbal mixtures and ways of curing common ailments. But I also possess the rare power of Psynergy. With the Ply power, I can heal injuries very easily.
Well, most Adepts are born with the power. However, there are a few cases where a sudden, direct impact of a Psynergy Stone to the head has unlocked the potential.
That's right, Toph. Although, water is only what I have natural affinity for. I've made use of the other elements from time to time as well.
... Why would he do such a thing to you?
... If he's your friend, why would Zuko do such a thing?
That seems unfortunate. There isn't as much of a divide like that in my world, but now that the power of Alchemy has been unsealed I'm a bit worried about my own future...
Well, Fizz joined me because he wanted to help me guard Mercury Lighthouse. The rest of them joined to help us on our quest, since they can share their power with adepts.
That's true. We spend most of our time indoors, unless it's a particularly sunny day. All the same, it's a calm place to live. The only thing that's lacking is the food we cook.
W-Well, the stripping part of this game is awfully fun. But with a lover, I suppose... I like having my hair pulled. And talking dirty is a lot of fun, hehe...
Things were shaken up a bit, but it was nothing we couldn't handle. I'm thankful for that.
I've been told there were some shockwaves when Mars was lit, but thankfully it was nothing too terrible.
The prospect of meeting people from strange, exotic places did immediately catch my interest. The fact that this was the most popular game was... well...
D-Don't misunderstand, the main thing that caught my interest was that there were so many unique people to meet! The fact that this game just happens to be the most popular one is...
It also helps that I've been studying the human body more. I can now use my Psynergy to better treat chronic injuries, even make people feel better than they were to begin with...
I've been studying the human body, too. My Psynergy is able to better treat long-standing injuries and ailments. People even turn up healthier than they were before they became sick...
Imil is rather cold for most of the year. Mercury Lighthouse can't have been much better for you, given that you are Mars-aligned...

state.text: Ah, yeah. It's pretty damp inside thanks for all the fountains and waterfalls. It must not have been very pleasant for you to get so wet.

case.state: It's really hot ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here, so I'm looking forward to getting out of this gear. Starting with my padded gloves...
Some of the sirens that live in Mercury Lighthouse are actually quite friendly. A bit odd in some ways, but overall they mean no harm.
Mercury Lighthouse was full of various Mercurial creatures, including the sirens. Not all of them are looking for a fight, and are actually pretty friendly.
I did ask a few of the sirens for general fashion advice. Their ways of dressing are very... particular, as you can tell.
It's pretty breezy with this dress being so short... I wouldn't go out in the snow for long like this.
The dress is pretty short, and these socks leave my inner thighs exposed... I wouldn't go out in the snow for very long like this.
T-This dress is quite snug around the chest. It has to be, given the lack of support it has. I don't know how the sirens fight in something like this.
I-I don't know how the sirens we did fight managed to do so, given how easily this kind of dress could slip right off.
Ah! I nearly forgot that I was wearing these things. They're not really a part of me -- these are made of wood. The sirens have real horns, though.
Ah, whoops! I nearly forgot I was wearing these horns. They're made of wood, not real bone. Though the sirens do have real ones...
This isn't the sort of undergarment I'd usually wear. It's so revealing! And yet, I feel... empowered, wearing it.
These gloves of mine are so comfortable, I sometimes forget I'm wearing them. At least, whenever I'm not somewhere super warm.
My home village is in a very cold place, so we dress to match. These boots are really thick and sturdy, which really helped given how much traveling I had to do on foot.
I never really took the time to get a new outfit, and I didn't want to just leave my cape somewhere, you know?
I never had anywhere to put my cape when we were traveling, so I just always wore it. It never weighed me down.
It's really cold up in Imil, so we dress in these thick layers. It's not so good for traveling in the desert. But underneath that...
This dress did me no favors when we were traveling through the Lamakan Desert. Back in Imil, we dress in thick layers to insulate ourselves from the cold. Underneath, however...
I'll only lower the top part for now. I can't go showing you all of my privates in one go, now, can I?
I'll only pull the top down for now, if that's alright. You can wait a little longer to see the rest, okay?
Hard to believe I've gotten this far... Just a little bit more, and you'll see everything...
Gosh, I'm really doing this...? Just a little bit more, and you'll be able to see... everything...

Thank you, Aqua.
I feel like I could give you another hug right about now. In fact...

Thank you, Aqua.
I feel like I could give you a hug right about now. In fact...

How very observant of you, Aqua...
Try not to stare at me for too long.
Oh, is that so? Your people have something like Psynergy? That sounds great, then!
And then, when they have used their power and are in a standby state, they can use their energy in tandem to transform into mighty summons, capable of vanquishing any foe!
My tits appreciate the compliment. I do not know what this Dynamax is, but it sounds like a big deal.
Adepts are usually born with their power. If not, then... well, we could always try hitting you really hard with a Psynergy rock.
I don't believe it needs to be the forehead, but that's what happened in the matter I can recall. A girl named Feizhi became a Jupiter Adept through such an event.
W-What? Oh, it's nothing special. My friends are able to use the different elements as well. Are you not able to use other elements...?
It's good that you are at peace now, but... That sounds like a very difficult start to a friendship!

Oh, interesting! The Djinn aren't really animals like you're thinking of. They're more... elemental spirits. Fizz can heal an ally, Mist can put foes to sleep, Hail can injure enemies with ice, and so on.
Well, ever since my cousin--... Er, I have two apprentices who have learned how to use Mercury's power, like me. So I'm not the only one in town who can use Psynergy.
T-That's good to know, Toph. I'm glad this is a place where I can share my fantasies and not be judged for them, as tepid as they may be.
It was definitely a worrying situation, but thankfully it worked out for the best.
Everything seemed so uncertain after what happened, but at least things have calmed down a little. I hope it stays that way.
Hehehe... That's certainly true. There's a certain appeal to it. I think it's called `skinship'? Getting familiar with other people by being... naked, with them.
Hehehe... Yeah. It's certainly a very... bold way of getting familiar with others. But you can't argue with the results.

state.text: Oh, please, you'll make me blush! I just love helping people however-- Oh! Aha, I actually forgot Fizz was with me. Hello, Fizz.

Oh, Jenna, please don't make me blush! I just enjoy being able to help others however I can.
Hm? Oh! Fizz! I'm so sorry, I forgot about you!

case.state: Think about how much stronger you've gotten since then. It was a struggle for me to conjure water at Mars Lighthouse, too.
It was difficult for me to conjure any water at Mars Lighthouse, too. But just think about how much stronger you are now!

Actually, come to think of it I also have my hair ties. Should I take them off?
Actually, I won't. Maybe some other time.
That dress was all that was concealing my own bosom... And now us ladies are even in this regard.
There. Now all us girls are even, right? It was a little bit tight around my chest, anyway.
Phew... There we go, now we're even. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let the girls loose, doesn't it?
Fweh... This thing is actually pretty tight on my chest. It feels good to let them out.
Phew... There we go. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let them loose.
It's bad enough that I had to travel with all the boys during our quest, now I can't even strip down without them being around...
It's a shame that some of the sirens were out for blood. The ones that were kind had a lot to talk about.
Looking after Mercury Lighthouse also means looking after its non-human denizens, including the sirens. The ones that didn't try to kill us, at least.
Just wearing this makes me feel a little more devious than usual... hehe!
The tail was also part of the dress, so... now I'm just stuck like this.
I-I suppose, in more ways than one, you could say that I was {small}horny{!reset}, hehe...
I feel so exposed like this... I'm really baring it all for you, aren't I?
I bet the people of Imil would never have imagined their `angel' dressing in such a provocative way, much less then getting naked for others.

state.text: Oh! Fizz, how long have you been here? He's a Mercury Djinni. The Djinn have helped myself and my friends in battle countless times.
Oh, look. I had Fizz back there and nearly forgot. Sorry, Fizz! The elemental Djinn have helped my friends and I out in battle many times.
Oh! Fizz, you were hiding in there? Sorry, I forgot about you. He's a Mercury Djinni. The Djinn have helped myself and my friends in battle countless times.
Oh! I'm sorry Fizz. I forgot you were hiding back there. Everyone, this is Fizz, a Mercury Djinni. The elemental Djinn have helped my friends and I out in battle many times.
Hopefully your world can--Oh! Fizz, you were hiding in there? Sorry, I forgot about you. He's a Mercury Djinni. The Djinn have helped myself and my friends in battle countless times.

case.state: Those gloves don't get in the way of my Psynergy, either. So they're good to have.
Gloves are practically necessary if you want to do anything outdoors in Imil. You don't want to catch frostbite, that's for sure.
In fact, Imil is far to the north of Angara. As the only healer left, dealing with the epidemics that break out in winter is tough to do by myself.
Imil is very far north, and dealing with epidemics as the only healer was tough business. I had two students, actually. I hope they're managing things while I'm away.
Imil is far to the north, and a few days' travel from any other settlements. I was the only healer most winters, and dealing with colds that spread about was tough to manage alone.
I must say, getting to travel across all of Weyard, while difficult, was a once in a lifetime journey that I'm glad I embarked on!
Oh, and this is the traditional undergarment for the Mercury Clan. It's a design we've been wearing for generations now.
What do you think? This is the traditional undergarment style for Mercury Clan. It's great for relaxing in the water with!
So... What do you think? This underclothing design is one the Mercury Clan has been wearing for ages. Don't I look good in it?
I feel so exposed like this... I'm really baring it all for you, aren't I?
Gosh, I feel so exposed like this... I'm really baring it all.
I-I hope the people of Imil never hear about this. Don't get me wrong, I'm having a good time. B-But I don't want them to know that their `angel' is doing a thing like this...
Fweh... This thing is actually pretty tight on my chest. It feels good to let them out.
Phew... There we go. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let them loose.
Try not to stare so much, boys. You'll make me blush!
Okay, boys. Try not to stare at me that much. I'll lose my composure...
What the character says just after they take their clothes off. Note that this is the start of a new stage.
Could you tell me more about your world, Dunban? From what I hear, yours is quite unusual!
Can you tell me more about this America place, Steve? From the sound of things, it must be the biggest and most prosperous nation in your world.
What sort of meals do you enjoy in this home town of yours, Steve? In a place as prosperous as that, you must have plenty of choice.
Somehow, Sly, d-despite the obvious, you don't seem to be that... uhm, nude, in my eyes.
D-Despite the obvious thing you're showing us, you don't seem naked, to my mind.
I've never seen symbols like what your metal friend was able to conjure... What purpose did they serve?
I have absolutely no clue who you're supposed to be dressed as... I feel as if I'm missing out on some joke.

state.text: I hope my presence here isn't distracting to you at all, Yuno...

case.state: Do things at whatever speed you like, ~name~.
I'll always cherish the memory of this moment.
It appears that ~name~ was the unlucky one.
Don't worry. You'll feel better once you've gotten this over with.
Hope you aren't too eager to lose...
It's just a game, let's not start taking this too seriously.
Good, ~target~ lost. Hehe...
I've been hoping to see more of you.
Oh, I won! Well, more accurately, ~target~ lost...
All eyes are now fixed on you, ~target~. I hope you don't feel pressured.
I've done my fair share of stripping -- now you do yours.
Goodness, is it your turn already, ~target~?
I've been waiting for... well, not very long at all.
Your turn, ~target~?
You've lasted this long, so one little loss isn't too disappointing, right?
W-Well... Go on...
F-Forgive me...
Gah... I'm so exposed like this, right in front of ~target~...
What can I say? I'm still looking forward to this.
Take all the time you need. I'm not going anywhere.
I've been enjoying myself all ~background.time~. Help me keep that up, alright?
You're doing just fine, ~target~. Just fine indeed.

state.text: Well, Aqua-- that is, the one who lost-- you're a fair bit taller than... er, the other Aqua. Could we call you Tall Aqua?

case.state: I do have something to ask you about, Jenna. See, if you're here... well, how are things with Isaac?
Forgive my ignorance, but what exactly do you do, Lysithea? I hear you're studying at some sort of elite academy, like your friends here?
Mercury, ruler of the seas, healer of all things. Keep us well, and cleanse us of our troubles.
Oh, Mercury, rules of the seas and healer of all things. Keep us all well, and cleanse us of our troubles.
Mercury, great star of the seas, and healer of all. Keep us in good health, and cleanse us of all that ails us.
Queenie, I have another question for you, if you don't mind it. Did you mention that you had family?
This facility place you mentioned, what is it like? Is it some kind of boarding place? If you have your own rooms, it must be where you live, right?
Perhaps it is your affinity to the powers of love that have given you such a cute form. Tell me, is there anyone close to you who you do... `love'?
Nayru, you're up n-- w-what is that?
Yes, I'm quite interested to learn about this team of yours. Though, I gather you're oddly against the ocean for some reason...?
Oh? This should be rather interesting. Going by the name of this team of yours, I should be one of your biggest supporters!
It's nice to meet another adept with the powers of water. Though, I suppose your power may not be Psynergy...?
It's wonderful to meet another adept with control of water, Barbara. Though, I suppose your power isn't actually Psynergy!
~Target~, I have to question this claim of yours of being a goddess. Are you perhaps some kind of avatar for Mercury? Is that what you mean?
You called yourself the founder of Alchemy? In my world, Alchemy's power is devastating, but necessary for the world itself to function...
The idea of living on another world fascinates me. How much power you must have had for your civilization to reach the stars... The only thing that comes close to it are the Anemos.
I can hardly comprehend how much power your people must have had to reach the stars. Only the Anemos of legend would have anything close to that kind of power.
Your golden hair looks absolutely beautiful, Jura! Do you look after it yourself, or do you have someone to do it for you?
Being able to live on other planets sounds so bizarre to me. How did your people manage to land on it? Are you able to live safely, or is there risk of falling off?
I believe I am getting the hang of your odd manner of speaking, Sofia. It seems obvious, given how your tone does not match your words.
Some friends of mine have dealt with pirates before. They sounded like they were desperate for supplies, and had no other choice...
I've heard about pirates before. From what my friends told me from their encounters near Champa, the pirates were desperate folk, who needed a way to save their town...
If you've traveled all over the seas of your world, Nami, does that mean you've been to the edge?
Have you ever visited the edge of your world, Nami? If you've sailed across the seas for so many years, you must've come close at least once, right?
You are some form of psychic, right? I gather that in your world, Psynergy has taken on different forms.
If I might ask, Queenie, do you have some kind of special power? Your grandiose entrance aside, I can feel something particular about you.
If you're curious about Mercury, I could try and explain. But I'm also rather curious about you, Queenie!
How are you doing, Sofia? Are you alright?
You know, I don't think we ever actually made time to camp anywhere when we were traveling across Weyard. We'd always come across an inn, or later on we just slept in the boat.
